entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
